snippet: Prince Paul of Romania was detained in a case of real estate fraud also involving a top aide to a former prime minister and a newspaper editor.
abstract: Romania's Prince Paul is detained for questioning in real estate fraud investigation.
lead_paragraph: Prince Paul of Romania was detained in a case of real estate fraud also involving a top aide to a former prime minister and a newspaper editor.

headline.main: Romania: Prince Detained in Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Europe; Romania: Prince Detained in Fraud Case
